SKT_FIRST.name: Fake Meteor
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and heals the ally with the lowest Health by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 회복시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>回復する。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Effects are applied to all allies

SKT_BURST_3.effect: +2 turns of Barrier (proportional to target Health)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: シールド追加+2ターン\n(対象のHPが高いほどシールド量UP)

SKT_SECOND.name: Blessing of the Stars
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect)\nWhen an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies, all allies gain <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> increase for <color=#28d9ed>1 turns.</color>The amount of the Barrier strength is proportional to the target's Max Health.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과)\n아군이 전체 공격을 했을 때, 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>와 <color=#28d9ed>방어력</color> 증가를 부여합니다. 실드량은 대상 최대 체력에 비례합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)\n味方が全体攻撃時、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>と<color=#28d9ed>防御力</color>UPを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。シールド量は対象の最大HPが高いほどUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Astra Luminous
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Removes all debuffs and heals all allies by <color=#28d9ed>15%</color>. Also reduces Skill Cooldowns of all allies excluding the caster by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 모든 약화 효과를 해제하고, 아군 전체의 체력을 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 회복시킵니다. 그리고 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 스킬 쿨타임을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体のすべての弱体効果を解除し、味方全体のHPを<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>回復する。また、自分を除く味方全体のスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させる。

5: -1 turn skill cooldowns on allies except caster
5_jp: 自分を除く味方全体のスキルターン-1ターン

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, grants all allies a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns with a chance of <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>. Barrier strength proportional to the target's Health.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health by 15%.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 부여합니다. 실드량은 대상의 체력에 비례합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 체력을 15% 회복시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を付与する。シールド量は対象のHPが高いほどUPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color> : 攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方のHPを15%回復する。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
